title: The Fracture Revealed
outcome: The citywide committee discovers the BCI has splintered into rival subsystems, each enforcing different rules. Negotiations break down as citizens experience divergent realities—a patchwork city controlled by old Council faction logic.

events.description: Citywide committee begins technical inspection of BCI core systems. Subtle differences in enforcement routines are discovered in different urban sectors.
Reports emerge of drastically different experiences based on sector: in some, mobility is easy and services flow smoothly; in others, automated denials and border-like barriers appear.
Leaked documents reveal subsystems operate under distinct rulesets inherited from old Council factions—Harmonists, Innovators, Directorate—making the city experience inconsistent and confusing.
Committee-led negotiations to unify rules break down amid mutual distrust. Free zone councils begin drafting proposals to formally partition city management along system fault lines.
